*** Variables ***

${MERCHANT_DETAILS}         merchant_details

*** Test Cases ***
Validate Transaction Summary View

    View Transaction Summary
    Validate Number And Amount Of Transactions Displayed
Description: This test case checks the validation for viewing number(#) and amount($) of invoices, credit cards, and ACH transactions in transaction summary functionality of the PayNOW datadriver.
Testcase name: Validate Transaction Summary View
